DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical trial investigate relationship gene polymorphism aldehyde dehydrogenase 2 contrast induce nephropathy mechanism .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergo coronary angiography percutaneous coronary intervention recruit study sign inform consent.5ml venous blood extract peripheral vein operation detect renal function , genotype enzyme activity aldehyde dehydrogenase 2 , level oxidative stress inflammation.Another 5ml venous blood extract peripheral vein 24-72 hour operation detect renal function level oxidative stress inflammation.Activated oxygen protein product , 4-HNE hs-CRP marker oxidative stress inflammation.The renal function index contain serum creatinine，urea nitrogen cystatin C .
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo elective coronary intervention coronary angiography Yu Qilu hospital . All patient guardian must sign consent form enter trial . Patients acute renal failure , renal transplantation , endstage renal disease , dialysis treatment , GFR < 15ml/min . Use renal toxicity drug treatment , non steroidal antiinflammatory drug , etc . Patients use contrast agent 10 day operation . Cardiac shock , hypotension ( systolic blood pressure ＜ 95mmHg ) , hyper tension difficulty control . Allergy contrast medium . Congestive heart failure ( left ventricular ejection fraction＜40 % ) , cardiac function NYHA grade IV . Pregnancy lactation .
